reviews.review: Fun game but toxic community and LOTS of cheaters. Would not recommend to snowflakes or thin skinned individuals. However, if you don't mind being called a brain dead autistic gay retard relentlessly and have pretty good aim its a fun game. Also you will meet the funniest Russians.
Best and fastest way to learn russian.

The best competitive FPS there is. The game that is still growing 8 years after release. There's a problem of cheaters but they won't bother you if you have prime and have a moderately high trust factor. There's no reason not to play this game. Each kill is satisfying and each round is different. I have over 1100 hours and hitting a headshot still feels the same. The Devs support it and it has the best esports scene. GET IT RIGHT NOW!!!!
great game to play if looking to battle online in quick multiplayer shooter first person gaming

El juego en si me encanta, pero ultimamente he jugado competitivos y hay una cantidad inmensa de cheaters. Esto se vio agravado desde que pusieron el juego gratis, ya que te dan el prime al nivel 21, cosa que no deberia ser. Esto hace que haya gente que cuando llega al nivel 21 empieza a chitearla.
En resumen: Valve pone un maldito anti cheat, uno decente.
